Flavor Text: It beats its wings together to create fire. As it moves in the steps of its beautiful dance, it bathes opponents in intense flames.
This Oricorio has sipped red nectar. Its passionate dance moves cause its enemies to combust in both body and mind.
It wins the hearts of its enemies with its passionate dancing and then uses the opening it creates to burn them up with blazing flames.
This Oricorio has drunk red nectar. If its Trainer gives the wrong order, this passionate Pok√©mon becomes fiercely angry.
